title: yasuo tips
body: how do you play yasuo properly

replies.body: you dont. But attack speed makes life easier, preference before 1.42 attack speed, go for attackspeed items over damage, and take fervor because it works best with attackspeed
learn what he counters hard then play him against those champs if you have the pick advantage... otherwise dont play him unless you wanna get dicked on hard.

I think it mostly comes down to practice, and I personally reached around 100k mastery on him before I found I was reliably winning games on him. A few things though are fairly standard; right runes/masteries (doesn't matter much anymore) and build.
